entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
